description:
imgpkg (pronounced: "image package") allows you to store and distribute sets
    of files (e.g. application configuration) as images in Docker (OCI) registries. Combine
    your configuration files, and a list of references to images on which they depend into
    an image that imgpkg calls a Bundle. Original primary use case for this CLI was to store
    application configuration (i.e. templates) as an image.
summary: Store application configuration files in Docker/OCI registries.
author: Carvel
